item.description:
Join JoJo and Carrie for an evening of kirtan and Prayerful Resonance Group Chant Activation! 

JoJo Silverman, creater of the Devotional Music Foundation has been studying yoga, meditation, holistic health, music, chanting, hand percussion, and firekeeping for over 15 years. Using sound for the exploration of consciousness, to connect our hearts and minds is his mission. http://www.MusicAsPrayer.org

Listen to JoJo on Kirtan Radio!

Carrie Grossman is a devotional singer, writer, and lover of love. A student of eastern mysticism, yoga, and mind-body medicine for many years, Carrie believes that sacred sound is a powerful portal to personal and planetary transformation. Nothing makes her happier than serenading the universe and sharing her sonic creations with other sentient beings.

www.thelightinside.org

 

Donation $15

To register, visit The Conduit Center's event page

This event is brought to you by Hartford Chants
item.name: Kirtan with JoJo Silverman and Carrie Grossman
